PROGRAM XI
UNDERWATER ANIMALS
Kinds of animals that live in water and some things about them#
Craig: Science- for the Elementary School Teacher
St. Louis Science Course of Study for Primary Grades
Wonderworld of Science: Book II
Scientific Living Series: Primary Grades
Pictures of water animals
Everyone
Find as many pictures of water animals as you can# Have them where
all can see#
Are all water animals fish?
Look for water animals when you are near a pond or river#
Do you have an aquarium?
Sound film - 13Ulb - We Visit the Seashore
Study prints - 3207s - Sea Life
PROGRAM XII
WHAT TIME IS IT?
The clock tells us about many things# Can you tell time?
Craig: Science for the Elementary School Teacher
Asleep? Lunch Midnight
A clock face with movable hands
School's out Asleep l
One boy and one girl - Mr. Timekeeper, Miss Timekeeper
If clock face is fixed on bulletin board where helpers can reach it,
no other preparation is necessary#
What time is it?
Can you read the clock's face?
Can you write a story about the clock?
